key_risks: Post-pandemic revenue decline due to normalization of COVID-19-related demand
Supply chain vulnerabilities and dependence on critical raw materials
Regulatory and competitive pressures in the life sciences sector
Stock performance volatility and declining investor sentiment
controversies: Significant revenue decline post-pandemic, raising sustainability concerns
Stock price volatility and analyst downgrades, including a shift to Sell by Goldman Sachs
social_issues: Reliance on pandemic-driven revenue highlights the need for diversification to address broader societal health challenges
